titles.title: An original resolution to pay a gratuity to Kate Lee; Paula Ray; James Owens; Nayomie Flood; Janice Sullivan; Dorothy White; Charles Sullivan; Bobby Sullivan; Andre Sullivan; Johnny Sullivan; Billy Sullivan; Patricia Crawley.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 439.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/17/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Senate to pay a gratuity to the children of a deceased employee of the Architect of the Capitol who was assigned to duty on the Senate side at the time of her death.
